data.description: This classic mid-century modern tri-level home is located in a well-established neighborhood between Flannagan Pond and Pine Meadow Pond. Some water views from every room. Reduce your carbon footprint as this home has all-electic heat...NO FOSSIL FUELS AND NO FURNACE TO MAINTAIN. With beautiful hardwood floors throughout, including beneath any remaining carpet, and semi-open concept main floor, this home could be a real gem with just a few updates. But, go ahead and move right in because the house is clean, fresh and ready for occupancy. There's tons of storage and over 400 square feet of additional living area in the partially finished lower level. And plenty of room for your vehicles and yard equipment with 3 garage spaces! Both a deck and a screen porch on the rear of this home provide extra space for outdoor enjoyment. Easy to show so call today for an appointment.
